comments.author: Youngki
comments.content: I agree with your point of view at life. It is also my sheer enjoyment to discover that your blog is one of the few blogs that have been updated persistently in my google reader which I haven't checked for like 4 years.

comments.author: Smart Arse
comments.content: If you're unlucky, a side street might be a seedy, dead-end alleyway with meth addicted hobos and other unsavory characters. What then? What then Randy?! WHAT THEN!?!?!?
